Core:Properties.Core:Property: "*Brief: A/an [metal] anklet of tiny bells\\r\\n*Look: A/an [metal] anklet adorned with several tiny [metal] bells.\\r\\n*Examine: A/an [metal] anklet adorned with several tiny [metal] bells. You should try shaking it.\\r\\n*Mechanism: When player types 'shake my anklet', the following emote would be shown - You shake your [metal] anklet of tiny bells, producing a faint ringing sound. To those present, would show - [Name] shakes their [metal] anklet of tiny bells, producing a faint ringing sound.\\r\\n*Notes: Would be made by jewelers. Two possible systems; first system, you make an anklet (lvl 12), than you make a bell (lvl 2 or 3?), and than you 'add my bell to my anklet', turning it into an anklet of tiny bells. Second system, have it as a stand-alone item crafted -from- an anklet at a higher level (no making of bells, which might complicate things). I like the second system more, but wanted flexibility for those who might disagree.\\r\\n*Additional note: Would be a great item for dancers/performers, who don't have many props."
